Cave_01:
A Monument to Loyalty<sp:0:4:0>Hyrule owes its peace today to the gift
that King Rauru gave unto us in his noble
feat of imprisoning the Demon King.<sp:0:4:0>The great battle began with support from
the sages, each of whom bore a shining,
secret stone.<sp:0:4:0>Among these were four Hyruleans, loyal
warriors all, who hastened to King Rauru's
aid as their oaths demanded.<sp:0:4:0>They are the pride of the peoples of
Hyrule. This stone monument is dedicated
to the loyalty that will echo through time.
